features: ✓ Upgrade 3th Generation MEXEERIS Floor Mop - Unlike other brand mop, MEXERRIS microfiber mops for floor cleaning never stop updating our microfibre mop quality stand on customer’s side. Reinforced stainless steel poles applied thicker and high purity material, sturdier and rustless. Upgrade premium ABS microfiber dust mop head connector, say no to cracking! Increased gravity on the microfiber dust mop plate, perfect solve the flip over problem when mopping!

✓ Cleaning with Ease – 360 degree rotating microfiber hardwood floor mop head for full direction cleaning solution. With this flexible Swivel Head, you could reach out narrow place that you can’t cleaning before, like under the couch, up on windows.The sturdy and well constructed handle is extendable so the floor mops for cleaning can adjust the height you want. No more bend over cleaning, no more hiding stains or dust in your house with our professional microfiber mops for floor cleaning.

✓ Reusable 4 Pack Microfiber Floor Mop Pads - Come with 4 pcs cost saving reusable mop pads, which is easy to take off and put on. Superior microfiber material features high water absorption, attracts and keeps hold of dust and dirt from your floor like a magnet. Microfiber mop pads can be washable and reusable, no self-wringing needed. you can always have a spare while one is in the wash. microfiber dust mops come with a Dirt Removal Scrubber, help you to remove dirt from the pads easily.

✓ Dust Mop and Wet Mop – Thanks to the durable high quality microfiber Pads, efficient in both dry and wet use, dry as a dust mop for floor cleaning for collecting dust and cleaning dirt, dog, cat and other pet hair, and use as a wet mops for floor cleaning to clean wooden floor, hardwood, vinyl, linoleum, cement, tile, laminate, stone and concrete floors.

✓ Buy with Confidence – Choose the best performance microfiber mop pad to achieve better water absorbing and removing dirt at mininal efforts, applied reinforced stainless steel poles for long life span, all parts material are strictly selected by our technical team to ensure your excellent shopping experience. We offer 12 months no hassle money back or replacement from the date you received if you are not happy with our product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well-constructed and rugged mop, with minor caveats
reviews.reviewText: This is a solidly constructed item that works very well on hardwood floors. Great maneuverability. And the mop pad stays in place even with heavy scrubbing, which can't be said for many similar products. Two minor points: 1) it requires some finger strength to open the clamps that secure the mop pad in place. People with arthritis might have some difficulty with it. 2) The instructions, like most anything you buy these days, are Google-translated from another language with limited graphics and are pretty much useless. Fortunately with a little trial and error you don't need them. They do not include any reference at all to an extra piece of hardware that seemed to have no real purpose but that clamps onto the handle. I later found out it's a brush to clean the mop pad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This mop is awesome!
reviews.reviewText: Our house has all hard wood and tile floors. I wanted a dry mop that would be easy to use and have the reusable pads to be environmentally sustainable. It was easy to put together, is light weight and gets under and behind furniture easily. Guess I must be older since I’m excited about this mop!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great mop, goodby Swiffer!
reviews.reviewText: No more filthy floors by way of super irritating Swiffer pads that don’t stay on and just push the dirt around. This mop is less flimsy and provides four reusable microfiber pads that pick up and retains dirt much better. There are two easy to use snap on strips that hold the pad in place. I tested floor cleanliness with Swiffer and with this mop, and this one hands down. I also didn’t have to keep putting pads back on and replacing them because they weren’t cleaning anyway. Ditch your miserable Swiffers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this mop!
reviews.reviewText: It's obviously not the "real deal" mop, and for a thorough clean I would use my actual mop, but for a quick clean and the sturdiness of the handle, it works great! I love that it came with so many pads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was very well pleased with this microfibre mop. It is built very sturdily and is very easy to maneuver, while the mop head stays positioned on the floor. Other brands I've had have easily flip flopped and not stayed in place. I also liked the very sturdy replacement pads that really stay put! They are washable also, and I expect them to hold up for a long time. Really impressed with the design and functionality of this mop!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The handle is not very strong, wiggles. Took out one section and was better. Wouldn’t work for a tall person.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is just what I need for my new wood floors. My old mop’s pad was held together by Velcro and very ineffective. This was easy to assemble and does a great job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Had to buy for my engineered wood floors. Nice large size and made with quality materials. Makes the job of cleaning floors so much easier and produces a beautiful desired effect when used with the recommended special spray I have to use.
Achat pratique, agréablement surprise par la qualité.

I've had a few microfiber mops in the past, all leave streaks or the cloth falls off etc.. but I used this mop for the first time today and it worked amazing. The cloths worked as a dry cloth to pick up cat/dog hair, then I switched it to a new cloth and used it wet and had zero issues. Best mop/cloths I've had since my steam cleaner. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewTitle: De las mejores compras que he hecho, sin duca
reviews.reviewText: es resistente, fácil de usar y el rastrillo pequeño con el que viene te permite quitar cabello o pelos de animales y queda súper limpio otra vez

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have a long haired dog, fur gets everywhere. This picks it up off the floor so easily and has a little scraper to get it off the pad. Easy to use saves getting vacuum out every day. Also good cleaning up mucky footprints of my laminate floor & tile kitchen. So far so good
Excellent product. Have used it now for 2 weeks and is very convenient and handy. Packaging is compact and easy to assemble.
